## Get Data

make sure we have all packages:
```{r}
if(!requireNamespace("rdwd", quietly=TRUE))
	install.packages("rdwd")
rdwd::updateRdwd()
```

download recent weather data using [rdwd](https://bookdown.org/brry/rdwd/)
```{r}
library(rdwd)
selectDWD("Potsdam")
```
